activities:
We receive general information from customers and vendors in the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland such as contact name, phone number, address and email address in order to form new or continue established business relationships.  We also share inter-company HR Information with our global branches as described below.

HR Information System
Our HR information system contains personal and statistical information of our employees on a global basis. The system is utilized to improve the reporting capabilities of our Global HR Department. Besides general statistical HR reports (1) we store information like emergency telephone numbers, training records and organizational responsibilities (roles/functions/by unit).

(1) Statistics & Report examples: 
• Number of employees by unit
• Number of employees by product group
• Number of employees by function
• Number of Managers/Directors/VP’s
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: For organization human resources data: EU Data Protection Authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner; for all other data: TRUSTe
